name: Spinach, Tangerines and Dried Cranberries
keywords: dried cranberries, spinach, tangerine, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon sherry vinegar or raspberry vinegar

recipeInstructions.text: Remove tough stems from spinach; wash and dry. Tear into bite-size pieces.
Peel and cut tangerines in half horizontally, and separate sections.
Whisk together vinegar, oil and mustard in a serving bowl. Stir in the spinach, tangerines and cranberries.
